idea-plugin.name: Notation Converter
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin adds ability to convert the selected name between camel case (used in field's names) and uppercase underscore (used in constant's names). Works similar to 'Toggle case' action.
E.g. 'MY_NAME' -> 'myName'.
Usage:
  • ALT+SHIFT+U on a name (shortcut).
  • Edit -> Camel Case / Underscore Conversion (from Edit menu).

action.description: changes notation of the selected name
